health_up.description:
HEALTH UP

HERE!

shootrate_up.description:
SHOOTRATE UP
SHOOT AN EXTRA

(don't buy more than 16 times)

maxbullet_up.description:
MAX BULLETS UP
UPGRADES MAXIMUM AMOUNT
OF BULLETS ONSCREEN!

tripleshot.description:
TRIPLE SHOT
WANNA LAG OUT THE GAME
 WITH MORE SPRITES?
HERE YOU GO!

rocket.description:
HOMING ROCKET
WANNA LAG OUT THE GAME
 WITH POOR ENEMY INDEXING?
HERE YOU GO!!!

wide.description:
WIDE SHOT
A SLOW-MOVING BULLET
YOU CAN USE AS A FORCEFIELD!

magnet.description:
COIN MAGNET
QUITE THE GREEDY THING,
 YOU ARE.

child.description:
LITTLE YUP
LITTLE GUY WHO FOLLOWS YOU
YOU LOSE IT IF YOU GET HURT.

rocketboots.description:
ROCKET BOOTS
GAIN A DOUBLE JUMP!

INDEX-welcometext:
HEY YOU LOOK POOR
 WANNA GET EVEN POORER??

LET'S RUIN YOUR CHANCE
 OF HAVING A HIGH SCORE

YOU DON'T SEE
 FELLOW YUPS OFTEN

DO YOU LIKE BUYING
THINGS? I DO

THIS GAME WAS IN
DEVELOPMENT FOR SIx
YEARS. DO YOU KNOW
WHAT YOU COULD DO IN THAT TIEM?

CHROMAKOPIA GREEN UGH
LIKE PICKLE RICK
CHROMAKOPIA I GOT A COLD I'M
CRAZY SICK MOCHA STARBUCK
HOT BROWN DRINK

SO ANYWAYS THERE'S THESE
GUYS IN TOILETS AND THEY
ARE IN A WAR WITH
THESE CAMERA HEAD GUYS

I WANT TO LEAVE HERE
 BUT THESE CONFINES
DO NOT LET ME.

EACH AND EVERY
INTRICATE DETAIL
FOR NOTHING.
